chapters.title: Prologue:  Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info:
Silviana Brehon,
      p. 65—Mistress of Novices in the White Tower.
      She is from the Red Ajah, and was appointed by
      Elaida after Sheriam left
      the Tower.  She is stocky, and has a square face.  Elaida herself goes
      to her occasionally for “voluntary” penanaces.
      See also
      a'Roihan, Elaida do Avriny;
      Bayanar, Sheriam;
      Keeper of the Chronicles;
      Noselle, Tiana.
